title: The 5 best tablets for kids in 2022
description: Giving your kid a tablet doesn't mean you're just handing them a portable entertainment device. It can also be an invaluable educational tool. The iPad is ZDNET's choice for the best kids' tablet due to its superior performance, long battery life, and AR features for learning.

title: Spigen Galaxy Z Fold 4 case roundup: Protect your Samsung investment
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 is a very expensive smartphone so spending $55 to $100 to protect your investment may be a worthy price to pay. Spigen has several options with various levels of protection and functionality.

title: Verizon, Razer unveil 'world's first 5G gaming device'
description: The Nintendo Switch lookalike was the big reveal at RazerCon 2022, as well as major expansions to Razer's gaming and streaming peripheral lines.

title: McDonald's and Burger King just got a startling message from important customers
description: If you thought you knew everything about fast food -- and technology's role in it -- you may be mistaken.

title: Supermarkets are taking laughable steps to stop self-checkout theft (customers hate it)
description: Some major supermarket chains are shutting down their self-checkout systems because of theft. Others are devoid of self-awareness.
